member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebHost.CreateDefaultBuilder
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with pre-configured defaults.
member.remarks: The following defaults are applied to the returned : use Kestrel as the web server and configure it using the application's configuration providers, set the to the result of , load from 'appsettings.json' and 'appsettings.[].json', load from User Secrets when is 'Development' using the entry assembly, load from environment variables, configures the to log to the console and debug output, enables IIS integration, and enables the ability for frameworks to bind their options to their default configuration sections.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebHost.CreateDefaultBuilder(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with pre-configured defaults.
member.remarks: The following defaults are applied to the returned : use Kestrel as the web server and configure it using the application's configuration providers, set the to the result of , load from 'appsettings.json' and 'appsettings.[].json', load from User Secrets when is 'Development' using the entry assembly, load from environment variables, load from supplied command line args, configures the to log to the console and debug output, enables IIS integration, and enables the ability for frameworks to bind their options to their default configuration sections.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebHost.CreateDefaultBuilder``1(System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with pre-configured defaults using typed Startup.
member.remarks: The following defaults are applied to the returned : use Kestrel as the web server and configure it using the application's configuration providers, set the to the result of , load from 'appsettings.json' and 'appsettings.[].json', load from User Secrets when is 'Development' using the entry assembly, load from environment variables, load from supplied command line args, configures the to log to the console and debug output, enables IIS integration, enables the ability for frameworks to bind their options to their default configuration sections.
member.typeparam: The type containing the startup methods for the application.
